main event: From April 6 to April 10, 1962, multiple sightings of unidentified objects were reported, with one notable sighting describing tracks with no apparent movement, resembling a plane or celestial body.
interesting points: The report includes observations from both military and civilian sources., The object's observation lasted for 2-3 minutes., One observer reported observing a light streak resembling a comet., Multiple reports reference an object that had no apparent movement above the horizon., Comet Seki was mentioned in related texts, which had expectations of brightness that it ultimately did not meet.
sighted object: Unidentified objects including tracks and streaks of light
witness description: A person who previously worked as an investigator on a UFO project
